name: Gakkou wo Tsukurou!! 2
overview: The Gakkou o Tsukurou series places the player in the principal of a school, placing him in charge of management and renovating the school grounds. The player decides everything: The place and the new buildings, the professors, the new places of the school, etc. In this sequel the game features new features like select the uniforms, new class, a lot new school boys and girls, and even enter inside the classroom to select the professor and tell him to teach the boys and girls and improve their stats.
